pageProduct.name: Remifemin Plus 60 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Remifemin° Plus  St Johns Wort is formulated for women with stronger symptoms of menopause and/or mood related symptoms arising out of menopause fluctuations. Along with an increased amount of Actaea racemosa to target heat and sweating, St. John's Wort has been added to assist psychovegetative symptoms such as nervous tension and agitation. It is recommended for women in the early stages of menopause when symptoms can be more intense or at any stage of menopause when more support is desired.

Warnings

Always read the label. Use only as directed. If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner.
Not suitable for women who are pregnant or breastfeeding.
Do not use the product if the blister foil is broken.
Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Menopausal Symptom Relief:
Severe Hot Flushes
Severe Night Sweats
Irritability & agitation
Low mood

Ingredients

Each film-coated tablet contains: Native dry extract concentrate (DER 6-11 :1) from Actaea racemose rhizome 3.75 mg, equivalent Actaea racemose (Dry) 31.9 mg, extraction solvent isopropyl alcohol 40% (V/V), concentration ratio 8.5:1, plus native dry extract concentrate (DER 3.5-6 :1) from Hypericum perforatum herb 71 .5 mg, equivalent Hypericum perforatum (Dry) 343.2 mg, extraction solvent ethanol 60% (V/V), concentration ratio 4.8:1.

Directions

One film-coaled tablet twice daily, or if necessary two film-coated tablets twice a day-with or without food.
